org.libav.avcodec

Interface ICodecContextWrapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IWrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCodecContextWrapper, CodecContextWrapper53, CodecContextWrapper54

    public interface ICodecContextWrapper
extends IWrapper
    Wrapper for the AVCodecContext. It provides access to some of the AVCodecContext properties and also it allows to work with the codec context using the Libav functions.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open(ICodecWrapper codec)
          throws LibavException
        Initialize the codec context to use the given codec.
        Parameters:
        codec - a codec
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the codec context cannot be initialized using the given codec (caused by the Libav)

      • close

        void close()
        Release all resources associated with the codec.

      • free

        void free()
        Release resources associated with this context. WARNING: DO NOT call this method if you have not created its corresponding stream using the FormatContextWrapper newStream() method.

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Check whether the codec context is initialized to use some codec or not.
        Returns:
        true if the context is initialized, false otherwise

      • getCodedFrame

        IFrameWrapper getCodedFrame()
        Get the coded_frame property from the AVCodecContext. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        coded frame

        int getCodecType()

        Returns:
        media type

      • decodeVideoFrame

        boolean decodeVideoFrame(IPacketWrapper packet,
                       IFrameWrapper frame)
                         throws LibavException
        Pass the given video packet to the decoder.
        Parameters:
        packet - a video packet (in)
        frame - a video frame (out)
        Returns:
        true if a video frame has been decoded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while decoding

      • encodeVideoFrame

        boolean encodeVideoFrame(IFrameWrapper frame,
                       IPacketWrapper packet)
                         throws LibavException
        Pass the given video frame to the encoder.
        Parameters:
        frame - a video frame (in)
        packet - a video packet (out)
        Returns:
        true if a packet has been encoded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while encoding
